MDFBlocks.py¶

Overview¶

This file contains “non-public” classes that are used by the main project file mdf.py. The classes in this file contain the low-level block structure definitions that come directly from the MDF specification sheet provided by Vector. Link to MDF specification sheet <https://vector.com/downloads/mdf_specification.pdf/>

class mdfblocks.IDBlock[source]¶
class mdfblocks.HDBlock(author, project, dut)[source]¶
class mdfblocks.TXBlock(text)[source]¶
class mdfblocks.DGBlock[source]¶
class mdfblocks.CGBlock(dgBlock, recordID)[source]¶
class mdfblocks.CNBlock(cg, channelType, signalName='', signalDescription='')[source]¶
class mdfblocks.CCBlock(cn, unit)[source]¶
class mdfblocks.CEBlock(canID, canIndex, messageName, senderName)[source]¶
